ValidationRule.description: SubClass and Detail Class are mandatory
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR($RecordType.DeveloperName =='Technical_Issue',$RecordType.DeveloperName =$Label.AeroCustomerSupportRecTypeName) && ( ISpickval( Sub_Class__c ,'') || ISpickval( Detail_Class__c ,'') )
&& ( or ( ispickval (Status,'Done'),ispickval (Status,'Tech Issue-SR Assigned'),ispickval (Status,'Propose to Close') ))
&& not(ispickval (Classification__c,'GTO D&S Technical Issue')) && (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Origin , 'Quick Case'))) && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator' && $Profile.Name != 'Honeywell System Administrator (Non US)' && $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile && $Profile.Name != 'GTO FSE/PSE/CSPM (Non US)'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: SubClass and Detail Class are mandatory
